attributes.action: A petition for uniting the Anglosphere within a Federal state.
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to encourage the long overdue debate about uniting the Anglosphere into a loose federation of states.

Currently the UK is already culturally linked to many states in the Anglosphere, among the most predominant the US, Canada, Australia and New Zealand. The bond between our nations is far stronger than any artificial purely economic union such as the EU.

We live in a time where the world is getting smaller and nations must form closer bonds to survive, however this is best served by uniting our common allies together into a union which is right under our noses in terms of common history, culture and language (the basic building blocks of a nation).
